class LightningReapp[source]

LightningReapp(config={}, pretrained_model_name='distilbert-base-uncased-finetuned-sst-2-english') :: LightningModule

Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using inheritance.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_avg_masked_encoding[source]

get_avg_masked_encoding(state:Tensor, attention_mask:Tensor)

[summary] For B = batch size, L = encoding length, F = feature vector: Args: state (torch.Tensor): (B, L, F) attention_mask (torch.Tensor): (B, L) Returns: torch.Tensor: (B, F), where L has been masked by attention_mask and then averaged. Each vector in the batch represents the average feature vector for the masked_encoding

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
